resources.string: You have successfully revoked AntennaPod\'s access token to your account. In order to complete the process, you have to remove this app from the list of approved applications in your account settings on the flattr website.

AntennaPod has no permission for this action. The reason for this could be that the access token of AntennaPod to your account has been revoked. You can either re-reauthenticate or visit the website of the thing instead.
Change your username and password for this podcast and its episodes.
The resource you requested requires a username and a password
The new Auto Download setting will automatically be applied to new episodes.\nDo you also want to apply it to previously published episodes?
Auto download is disabled in the main AntennaPod settings
Flattr episode as soon as %d percent have been played
No connection to the cast device is present
Connection to the cast device has been lost. Application is trying to re-establish the connection, if possible. Please wait for a few seconds and try again.
Receiver player has encountered a severe error
Failed to seek to the new position on the cast device
Failed to sync up with the cast device
Failed to pause the playback of media
Failed to start the playback of media
Failed to stop the playback of media
Media selected is not compatible with cast device
Please choose the base of your data folder. AntennaPod will create the appropriate sub-directories.
Access to external storage is required to change the data folder
Please confirm that you want to clear the queue of ALL of the episodes in it
Are you sure you want to close AntennaPod?

Downloading over mobile data connection is disabled in the settings.

Do you want to allow downloading temporarily?

Your choice will be remembered for 10 minutes.

Downloading over mobile data connection is disabled in the settings.

You can choose to either only add the episode to the queue or you can allow downloading temporarily.

Your choice will be remembered for 10 minutes.
Send the latest crash report via e-mail
Unable to delete file. Rebooting the device could help.
IO Error: failed to connect to feeds.example.com/100.100.100.100 (port 80) after 3000ms: isConnected failed: ECONNREFUSED (Connection refused)

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vivamus ullamcorper tempor metus, at varius tellus dignissim et. Fusce quis justo sollicitudin, feugiat mi in, accumsan erat. Fusce tempor, sapien ut luctus scelerisque, lectus nisi hendrerit odio, eget mattis lorem massa id eros. Integer consequat tellus eu rhoncus pellentesque. Quisque et leo faucibus, aliquam nisi ut, feugiat lectus.
Tap back button again to exit
Download canceled\nDisabled Auto Download for this item
An error occurred when trying to download the file:\u0020
Drag to change the position of this item
Number of new and unplayed episodes
Sort by number of played episodes
The episode cache limit has been reached. You can increase the cache size in the Settings.
List of terms used to decide if an episode should be included or excluded when auto downloading
The exported file was written to:\n\n%1$s
No external storage is available. Please make sure that external storage is mounted so that the app can work properly.
Please confirm that you want to delete the podcast \"%1$s\" and ALL its episodes (including downloaded episodes).

Press the button below to start the authentication process. You will be forwarded to the flattr login screen in your browser and be asked to give AntennaPod the permission to flattr things. After you have given permission, you will return to this screen automatically.
Authentication was successful! You can now flattr things within the app.
The folder you have selected is not empty. Media downloads and other files will be placed directly in this folder. Continue anyway?
Create a new device to use for your gpodder.net account or choose an existing one:
Device ID must not be empty
Congratulations! Your gpodder.net account is now linked with your device. AntennaPod will from now on automatically sync subscriptions on your device with your gpodder.net account.
Welcome to the gpodder.net login process. First, type in your login information:
If you do not have an account yet, you can create one here:\nhttps://gpodder.net/register/
Usernames may only contain letters, digits, hyphens and underscores.

This experimental function can be used to transfer your subscriptions and played episodes to another device.

Exported databases can only be imported when using the same version of AntennaPod. Otherwise, this function will lead to unexpected behavior.

After importing, episodes might be displayed as downloaded even though they are not. Just press the play button of the episodes to make AntennaPod detect this.
Import successful.\n\nPlease press OK to restart AntennaPod
Include this feed when (auto-)refreshing all feeds
Please confirm that you want to mark all episodes as being played.
Please confirm that you want to mark all episodes in this podcast as being played.
Please confirm that you want to mark all episodes as seen.
Your app has not been granted the READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission.
Storage permission is needed for this operation
When you add a podcast, the episodes will be shown here.
You can download episodes on the podcast details screen.
You can add episodes to the favorites by long-pressing them.
You haven\'t subscribed to any podcasts yet.

Your flattr account does not seem to be connected to AntennaPod. You can either connect your account to AntennaPod to flattr things within the app or you can visit the website of the thing to flattr it there.
Your flattr account does not seem to be connected to AntennaPod. Tap here to authenticate.
After you listen to an episode, it will appear here.
Add an episode by downloading it, or long press an episode and select \"Add to queue\".
Download logs will appear here when available.
When new episodes arrive, they will be shown here.

For variable speed playback to work, we recommend to enable the built-in Sonic mediaplayer [Android 4.1+].

Alternatively, you can download the third party plugin Prestissimo from the Play Store.
Any problems with Prestissimo are not the responsibility of AntennaPod and should be reported to the plugin owner.
You can download episodes on the podcast details screen.
Shown if something went wrong, for example if download or gpodder sync fails.
Allows to control playback. This is the main notification you see while playing a podcast.
Shown if your action is required, for example if you need to enter a password.
No podcast was provided that could be shown.
Access to external storage is required to read the OPML file
Choose a specific file path from the local filesystem.
Use an external applications like Dropbox, Google Drive or your favourite file manager to open an OPML file.
Many applications like Google Mail, Dropbox, Google Drive and most file managers can open OPML files with AntennaPod.
OPML files allow you to move your podcasts from one podcatcher to another.
An error has occurred while reading the OPML document:
For new podcasts, you can search iTunes or fyyd, or browse gpodder.net by name, category or popularity.

You can set an interval like \"every 2 hours\", set a specific time of day like \"7:00 AM\" or disable automatic updates altogether.\n\nPlease note: Update times are inexact. You may encounter a short delay.
Specify an interval or a specific time of day to refresh the feeds automatically
Update Interval or Time of Day
Allow automatic download over the mobile data connection.
Allow automatic download only for selected Wi-Fi networks.
Allow automatic download when the battery is not charging
Configure the automatic download of episodes.
Change behavior of the back button.
Chromecast requires third party proprietary libraries that are disabled in this version of AntennaPod
Enable support for remote media playback on Cast devices (such as Chromecast, Audio Speakers or Android TV)
You can only select a maximum of %1$d items.
Change the playback buttons on the lockscreen. The play/pause button is always included.
Automatically remove an episode from the queue when it is deleted.
Download media files only over WiFi
Add downloaded episodes to the queue
Total number of downloaded episodes cached on the device. Automatic download will be suspended if this number is reached.
Episodes that aren\'t in the queue and aren\'t favorites should be eligible for removal if Auto Download needs space for new episodes
This usually expands the notification to show playback buttons.
Android versions before 4.1 do not support expanded notifications.
Customize the number of seconds to jump forward when the fast forward button is clicked
Keep episodes when they are marked Favorite
Sign in to your flattr account to flattr things directly from the app.
Support the development of AntennaPod by flattring it. Thanks!
Jump to next queue item when playback completes
Login with your gpodder.net account in order to sync your subscriptions.
Sync all subscriptions and episode states with gpodder.net.
This setting does not apply to authentication errors.
Change the login information for your gpodder.net account.
Sync subscription and episode state changes with gpodder.net.
When pressing a forward button on a bluetooth-connected device skip to the next episode instead of fast-forwarding
When pressing a hardware previous button restart playing the current episode instead of rewinding
Size of the disk cache for images.
Set the lockscreen background to the current episode\'s image. As a side effect, this will also show the image in third party apps.
Select which media player to use to play files
Allow updates and manual episode downloads over the mobile data connection
Change the information displayed by the subscription counter. Also affects the sorting of subscriptions if \'Subscription Order\' is set to \'Counter\'.
Change the order of your subscriptions
Change which items appear in the navigation drawer.
Customize the appearance of the navigation drawer.
Pause playback when headphones or bluetooth are disconnected
Pause playback instead of lowering volume when another app wants to play sounds
Keep notification and lockscreen controls when playback is paused.
Customize the speeds available for variable speed audio playback
Displayed position and duration are adapted to playback speed
Adjust media info to playback speed
Add new episodes to the front of the queue.
AntennaPod has to be restarted for this change to take effect.
Resume playback after a phone call completes
Revoke the access permission to your flattr account for this app.
Customize the number of seconds to jump backwards when the rewind button is clicked
If downloads fail, generate a report that shows the details of the failure.
Keep episodes when they are skipped
Mark episodes as played even if less than a certain amount of seconds of playing time is still left
Resume playback when the headphones are reconnected
Host is not a valid IP address or domain
We would appreciate it if you take the time to rate AntennaPod.
Share Media File URL with Position
%1$d out of %2$d episodes started.\n\nPlayed %3$s out of %4$s.
Sum up all podcasts marked as played
Calculate duration that was actually played. Playing twice is counted twice, while marking as played is not counted
Notice: Playback speed is never taken into account.
Invalid input, time has to be an integer

string.b: When timer is about to expire:
